import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { AuthContext } from '../components/AuthProvider'; import { HomeIcon, UserPlusIcon, UploadIcon, DollarSignIcon, SettingsIcon, GiftIcon } from 'lucide-react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; const containerVariants = { hidden: { opacity: 0 }, visible: { opacity: 1, transition: { staggerChildren: 0.2, }, }, }; const cardVariants = { hidden: { opacity: 0, scale: 0.9, y: 20 }, visible: { opacity: 1, scale: 1, y: 0, transition: { duration: 0.5, ease: 'easeOut' } }, hover: { scale: 1.05, transition: { duration: 0.3 } }, }; const Dashboard = () => { const { user, loading } = useContext(AuthContext); if (loading) { return (
